definition.text: The button cycles through several arrangement options that affect where a node is placed in relation to its parent.

paragraphs.text: In the drawing, the orange dot represents the parent node, and the blue dots represent the node adopting the specific arrangement style.
Concave: This is the default style. The node adopts a slot on a circumsference around its parent node.
Convex: The slot is on a convex curve.
Vertical-Right: On a vertical line to the right.
Vertical-Left: The slot is on a vertical line to the left.
Horizontal-Bottom: On a horizontal line below.
Horizontal-Top: The slot is on a horizontal line above.
